name: ngs_reporting
title: NGS Reporting
summary: NGS oncology reporting and variant filering for bcbio-nextgen

inputSpec.name: bcbio_dir
inputSpec.label: Input directory path
inputSpec.help: Input directory can be either 'final' upload directory of a bcbio_nextgen run, or its parent directory, in which case the location will be derived from bcbio's yaml config.

outputSpec.name: report_files
outputSpec.label: Reports and filtered calls
outputSpec.help: Array of files generated by the reporting pipeline. All of them are uploaded on top of the input directory, and linked into main landing page report.html
